articles.author: Kishan Vyas
articles.title: Twitter finally rolls out the ability to create a Space to everyone - XDA Developers
articles.description: Twitter is finally opening up the ability to host Spaces to everyone. Now anyone on Android and iOS can create a Space.
articles.content: Last year Twitter introduced Spaces, the company’s take on Clubhouse-style audio chat rooms. Initially limited to iOS, Twitter finally expanded Spaces to Android earlier this year. At the time, Andro… [+1628 chars]

articles.title: WhatsApp has a new picture-in-picture UI - PhoneArena
articles.description: There’s a new WhatsApp update submitted through the Google Play Beta Program, bringing the app version to 2.21.22.3.
articles.content: Theres a new WhatsApp update submitted through the Google Play Beta Program, bringing the app version to 2.21.22.3. As always, the guys at WaBetaInfo dissected the software package in search of new f… [+1017 chars]

articles.title: If WhatsApp chats are end-to-end encrypted why do Bollywood chats keep leaking all the time - India Today
articles.description: WhatsApp chats are end-to-end encrypted yet time and again the chats of Bollywood celebrities are accessed whenever there is a case against them. Why and how does it happen?
